titles.title: Sewage Treatment Overflow Prevention through Community Sanitation Outreach Act of 2019
To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to ensure that publicly owned treatment works monitor for and report sewer overflows, and for other purposes.
Sewage Treatment Overflow Prevention through Community Sanitation Outreach Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

bill.summary:
Sewage Treatment Overflow Prevention through Community Sanitation Outreach Act of 2019 or the STOP CSO Act of 2019
This bill requires certain publicly owned water treatment facilities to monitor, report on, and notify the public of sewer overflows.
